user.title: Set up HA DHD Audio
user.description: Connect to your DHD mixer and add your first logic. You can add more logics later via Options.

data_description.logic_id: The logic number from DHD Toolbox. For RM5200: View → Audio and Logic IDs View → use Base/Addr column. For RM4200D: Logic Sources window (F5).
